items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals weaker open for India markets; Hang Seng declines 10%
items.description: Stock Market Today: GIFT Nifty futures, trading around 100 points behind Nifty futures' last close, indicated a lower open for Indian markets, amid weak global sentiment.

items.title: F&O Alert: FIIs net sell 3.5 lakh Nifty, Bank Nifty futures in just 3 days
items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 08: FIIs turn bearish on Indian stocks, long-short ratio in index futures dipped below 1 for the first time since August 14. Retail and proprietary trades turn bullish.

items.title: JLR's disappointing September quarter update drags Tata Motors share 4%
items.description: The decline in Tata Motors share came on the back of disappointing sales figures for Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) in the September quarter (Q2FY25).

items.title: Nykaa's share price falls despite strong Q2 update; check details here
items.description: Shares of FSN E-Commerce Ventures, parent of e-commerce brand Nykaa dropped as much as 2.65 per cent a piece on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday trade

items.title: Will foreign investors continue to sell or return to India? Experts decode
items.description: Analysts, however, suggest that the retail investors can capitalise on this opportunity to buy quality stocks at relatively better prices, provided they reach attractive levels

items.title: Indian bond yields expected to inch up as 10 year US yield tops 4%
items.description: Expectations of a 25 bps cut in November are at 88 per cent, while bets of no cut rose to 12 per cent from less than 10 per cent a day ago

items.title: Time to downgrade Indian stock markets? Sell India, buy China? Analyst view
items.description: Absolute-return investors must avoid Indian markets in the backdrop of recent developments, especially the stimulus by China, suggests a report by BCA Research

items.title: SBI declares MTNL account as NPA: Share price down 8% today, 15% in 3 days
items.description: MTNL share price: MTNL share price declined 7.5 per cent to Rs 48.2 per share on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday trade

items.title: Metal index corrects for 4th day in a row; NMDC, Tata Steel slip up to 8%
items.description: The Nifty Metal index, the top loser among sectoral indices, was down 2 per cent, as compared to the 0.35 per cent rise in the Nifty 50, at 9:53 AM.

items.description: Garuda Construction has succeeded in garnering reviews from several brokerages including Anand Rathi Research, SMIFS, and Arihant Capital Markets for its IPO

items.title: Ola Electric gets show cause notice from CCPA on misleading ads; down 6%
items.description: Shares of recently listed Ola Electric Mobility fell by 6.17 per cent in intraday deals to Rs 85.21 on Tuesday after the Central Consumer Protection Authority (CCPA) served a show cause notice

items.title: HEG surges 6% after buying 8.23% stake in GrafTech Int'l for Rs 250 crore
items.description: Graftech has a competitive portfolio of low cost, ultra-high power graphite electrode manufacturing facilities, with some of the highest capacity facilities in the world.

items.title: Swelect Energy Systems stock jumps 5% as subsidiary opens new solar plant
items.description: Shares of Swelect Energy Systems surged up to 5.19 per cent at Rs 1,151.50 per share on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday deals
